nodes.name: G-Mode Morph Junction (Above the Power Bomb Blocks)
nodes.note: Represents being on the Power Bomb blocks with G-Mode Morph (artificial morph)

obstacles.name: Power Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The Power Bomb blocks above the bottom doors

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bubble Mountain Damage Boost
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Crossing between the topmost doors of Bubble Mountain by damage boosting using a Waver.

to.note: This link only includes ways of crossing to 7 that can't be done from node 9
This link is only for the X-Ray climb, which skips the junction altogether.
This link only includes ways of crossing to 1 that can't be done from node 9

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Place a Power Bomb on the bottom stair attached to the door in order to prevent killing the Sova, or free a Sova from the Morph maze with Bombs.
If coming from below, be sure to lure the Sova to the bottom before placing a Power Bomb near the blocks in order to prevent killing it.
Use the frozen Sova to climb to the top left door. Stand on a low frozen Waver to lower the camera enough to get the Sova to move again.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Waver
G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Wait 20 seconds for a Waver to come and hit Samus.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Slide off the edge to kill the Waver with blue.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Kill King Cac by scrolling the camera before Grappling across.

strats.name: Walljump
strats.note: King Cac can be killed by scrolling the camera before jumping across.

strats.name: Open Door Full Runway Jump
strats.note: Kill King Cac by scrolling the camera, before attempting the jump.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Damage Boost (Left to Right)
strats.note: Damage Boost off a Waver to cross the gap.

strats.name: Hero Shot Shinespark
note: Jump over the Waver, fire a shot mid-air, and activate the shinespark wind-up.
Wait until the shot is at a specific position before sparking.
Sparking too late will cause the shot to despawn before reaching the door.
Sparking too early will cause Samus to bonk the door as it will not yet be open.
A beam shot, Missile, or Super can be used.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Running Jump into Right Side Precise Walljump Climb
Running Jump into Right Side Walljump Climb

Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (HiJump Space Jump)

X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 2 screens.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 2 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Enter Running, Climb Bubble Stairs, and Shinespark
Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
strats.note: Be sure to lure the Sova to the bottom before placing a Power Bomb near the blocks in order to prevent killing it.
strats.devNote: This is only useful if the blocks are broken, but if they are not broken the longer runway can be used.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Lure a Sova from the bomb maze, or from just below the Power Bomb blocks.
Using a Power Bomb while avoiding killing the Sova can be done by placing the Power Bomb on the lowest stair on the ledge above,
Starting at the bottom of the room and going up through the Power Bomb blocks can be done by first luring the Sova into safety at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Enter Running and Shinespark
strats.note: Diagonal spark from the Save Room Door steps.

strats.name: Enter Shinecharged and Shinespark
strats.note: Diagonal spark from the Save Room Door steps.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 3 screens.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 3 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 2 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Starting from the top of the room will require careful manipulation of the Sovas.
If going through the Power Bomb blocks, place the Power Bomb on the lowest stair on the ledge above,
go down and lure the Sova up and use a Super to knock it off once it is just above the right side of where the Power Bomb blocks were.
If using Bombs, lure the Sova that is just below the Power Bomb blocks, then use a Super to prevent it from going into the Morph tunnel.
Starting at the bottom of the room and going up for the item before coming back down can be done, even with a Power Bomb, by first luring the Sova into safety at the bottom of the room.
strats.devNote: FIXME: It is possible to do this by following the Sova around the room to avoid resetting the room or using a Super.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sova
note: Starting from the top of the room will require careful manipulation of the Sovas.
If going through the Power Bomb blocks, place the Power Bomb on the lowest stair on the ledge above,
go down and lure the Sova up and use a Super to knock it off once it is just above the right side of where the Power Bomb blocks were.
If using Bombs, lure the Sova that is just below the Power Bomb blocks, then use a Super to prevent it from going into the Morph tunnel.
Starting at the bottom of the room and going up for the item before coming back down can be done, even with a Power Bomb, by first luring the Sova into safety at the bottom of the room.
strats.devNote: FIXME: It is possible to do this by following the Sova around the room to avoid resetting the room or using a Super.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks
strats.note: Place a Power Bomb high enough to reach the blocks above.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks (Power Bombs Only)
note: The blocks are breakable with 4 Power Bombs.
Horizontally bomb over the vertical door then up two ledges before placing a Power Bomb that can reach the blocks above.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.devNote: This strat is not useful in-room, but can satisfy a strat in the room before with an exit shinespark.

strats.name: G-Mode Indirect Morph Power Bomb the Blocks
strats.note: Place a Power Bomb high enough to reach the blocks above.

strats.name: Power Bomb Blocks
strats.devNote: It is possible to go through the Morph Maze with a single Power Bomb, placed low enough to not break A, but this isn't very useful.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Ice Clip
note: Freeze the wall crawler at a precise location in order to jump through the Power Bomb Blocks.
The pixel window is larger and higher with Morph and an X-Ray Stand Up.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled) with a horizontal position of 21 (as far right as possible).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition above, without needing to open the door.
At the beginning of the climb, avoid pressing left without X-Ray being held, to prevent triggering the transition of the lower door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled) with a horizontal position of 21 (as far right as possible).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition above, without needing to open the door.
At the beginning of the climb, avoid pressing left without X-Ray being held, to prevent triggering the transition of the lower door.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Waver
strats.note: Wait 50 seconds for a Waver to get to this door.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Wait 50 seconds for a Waver to come and hit Samus.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged and Leave Shinesparking
Come in Shinecharged and Leave Shinesparking (HiJump)
Run in and Leave Shinecharged (HiJump Wall Jump)
G-Mode Morph
note: Lower the camera to watch the Wavers and to help avoid them.
With Bombs alone, it may be helpful to kill the top Waver; this can be done by placing Bombs in a vertical line and then moving out of the way as it approaches.

strats.name: Springball Bounce
note: Use the full runway of the top-right door to jump to the ledge below the Cacatac and mockball on it.
Either full jump from the left side of this platform, or do a small hop followed by a big jump to cross the gap.
Disabling Springball once past the Grapple Blocks makes this much easier.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.devNote: Ending the spark earlier takes a hit from the Waver

strats.name: Enter Shinecharged and Shinespark from Cacatac Platform
note: Dealing with spikes is up to luck.
It is possible to shoot the Cacatac while jumping towards it.

strats.name: Run in and Shinespark from Cacatac Platform
note: Dealing with spikes is up to luck.
It is possible to shoot the Cacatac while jumping towards it.

strats.name: Shinespark from Cacatac Platform Through Door
note: Kill the Cacatac and quickly jump over to its platform.
Shoot towards the top-left door to open it, then follow the shot by jumping over the pit before initiating the shinespark.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Damage Boost (Right to Left)
strats.note: Damage Boost off a Waver to cross the gap.

strats.name: Hero Shot Shinespark
note: Run and jump,  fire a shot mid-air, and activate the shinespark wind-up.
Wait until the shot is at a specific position before sparking.
Sparking too late will cause the shot to despawn before reaching the door.
Sparking too early will cause Samus to bonk the door as it will not yet be open.
A beam shot, Missile, or Super can be used.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled) with a horizontal position of 21 (as far right as possible).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition above, without needing to open the door.
At the beginning of the climb, avoid pressing left without X-Ray being held, to prevent triggering the transition of the lower door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled) with a horizontal position of 21 (as far right as possible).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb to get up to the door transition above, without needing to open the door.
At the beginning of the climb, avoid pressing left without X-Ray being held, to prevent triggering the transition of the lower door.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Sova
note: Place a Power Bomb on the bottom stair attached to the door in order to prevent killing the Sova, or free a Sova from the Morph maze with Bombs.
If coming from below, be sure to lure the Sova to the bottom before placing a Power Bomb near the blocks in order to prevent killing it.
Use Space Jump to follow the Sova to the top right door. Freeze it just at the bottom of the small stairs, as Samus can run over the half-tile gap that remains.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Waver
strats.note: Wait 40 seconds for a Waver to get to this door.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
strats.note: Wait 40 seconds for a Waver to come and hit Samus.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Lower the camera to watch the Wavers and to help avoid them.
With Bombs alone, it may be helpful to kill the top Waver; this can be done by placing Bombs in a vertical line and then moving out of the way as it approaches.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bombs Only
note: Use one Power Bomb to jump towards the Cacatac then a second to jump over it and down below.
Do not land where the Cacatac was, or Samus will get hit by its invisible spikes.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain HiJump Walljump (Left)
strats.note: This is the same size of ledge as writg, so it should be equally possible.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Hjless Walljump (Left)
strats.note: This is the same size of ledge as writg, so it should be equally possible.

strats.name: Speedy Jump with Grapple
strats.note: Jump from the Save room door runway and use Grapple to grab onto the Grapple Blocks.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Tricky Spring Ball Jump with Grapple
note: Perform a very tight Spring Ball jump from the Save room door runway, starting from either a crouch or spin jump,
then use Grapple to barely reach the ceiling blocks.

strats.name: Dual Jump Assist
strats.note: Run and Jump into a Springball Jump from the Save Room runway.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Right Side Delayed Walljumps
strats.note: A tricky, delayed walljump makes it possible to climb to top right in-room, with nothing.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph IBJ
strats.note: Carefully dodge the Wavers while being prepared to abort the IBJ and start over if necessary.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks
G-Mode Morph IBJ
note: Carefully dodge the Wavers while being prepared to abort the IBJ and start over if necessary.
It may be best to first IBJ to the top left side and kill the top Waver with Bombs;
this can be done by placing bombs in a vertical line, then dodging the Waver as it approaches.
